comment: /**  * Returns a description of the failure.  * @return the description  */
code: /**  * Returns a description of the failure.  * @return the description  */ public String getDescription() {     return this.description. }

comment: /**  * Returns the action, if any, to be taken to address the failure.  * @return the action or {@code null}  */
code: /**  * Returns the action, if any, to be taken to address the failure.  * @return the action or {@code null}  */ public String getAction() {     return this.action. }

comment: /**  * Returns the cause of the failure.  * @return the cause  */
code: /**  * Returns the cause of the failure.  * @return the cause  */ public Throwable getCause() {     return this.cause. }
